{

 "messageBody4":"",
 "messageBody5":"Error count : @{activity('GetErrorCount').output.firstRow.ERROR_COUNT}",
 "emailAddress":"@{pipeline().parameters.emailAddress}"
}

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT CONCAT(CASE WHEN Error_Count = 0 THEN '!!! ERROR SOME EXCEL SHEETS MAY NOT BE LOADED: SUCCESSFUL LOAD : ' ELSE '!!! ERROR SOME EXCEL SHEETS MAY NOT BE LOADED: FAILED LOAD : ' END,Work_Sheet, ' - ', Work_Book) AS Message_Header,
Ops_Representative_Email, Ops_Representative_Last_Name, Ops_Representative_First_Name, Error_Table, Error_Count 
FROM (
SELECT Work_Book, Work_Sheet, Ops_Representative_Email, Ops_Representative_Last_Name, Ops_Representative_First_Name,
CASE WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Certifications' THEN 'audit.OPS_Certification_Error'
     WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Timber Sales' THEN 'audit.OPS_Timber_Sales_Error'
ELSE NULL END AS Error_Table,
CASE WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Certifications' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit.OPS_Certification_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}')
     WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Timber Sales' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit.OPS_Timber_Sales_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}')
ELSE NULL END AS Error_Count
FROM (
SELECT Work_Book, Work_Sheet, wb.Asset_ID, wb.Fund_ID,
ra.Ops_Representative_First_Name, ra.Ops_Representative_Last_Name, ra.Ops_Representative_Email
FROM [audit].[OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List] wb
JOIN [relational].[Asset] ra 
ON wb.Asset_Id = ra.Asset_ID AND wb.Fund_Id = ra.Fund_ID  AND ra.record_deleted_flag = 0 AND wb.Work_Book = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}') x
)z;

body.value:
{
"messageHeader":"@{item().Message_Header}",
"message1":"Error Log Table: @{item().Error_Table}",
"message2":"Error Count: @{item().Error_Count}",
"message3":"If there is error, please check in the Error Log Table",
"message4":"Thank you.",
"message5":"Datafactory Name: DWH-Prod-ADF",
"message6":"Pipeline Name: ProcessOPSWorkbookMaster_pl",
"emailAddress":"@{item().Ops_Representative_Email}",
"lastName":"@{item().Ops_Representative_Last_Name}",
"firstName":"@{item().Ops_Representative_First_Name}"
}

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT '!!! PIPELINE ERROR : SOME OR ALL EXCEL SHEETS MAY NOT BE LOADED' AS Message_Header,
Ops_Representative_Email, Ops_Representative_Last_Name, Ops_Representative_First_Name, Error_Table, Error_Count 
FROM (
SELECT Ops_Representative_Email, Ops_Representative_Last_Name, Ops_Representative_First_Name,
'None' AS Error_Table,
'None'AS Error_Count
FROM (
SELECT ra.Ops_Representative_First_Name, ra.Ops_Representative_Last_Name, ra.Ops_Representative_Email
FROM relational.Asset ra 
WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 
AND ra.Asset_ID = '@{pipeline().parameters.Asset_ID}' 
AND ra.Fund_ID = '@{pipeline().parameters.Fund_ID}') x
)z;

{

"message5":"Datafactory Name: DWH-Prod-ADF",
"message6":"Pipeline Name: ProcessOPSWorkbookMaster_pl",
"emailAddress":"@{item().Ops_Representative_Email}",
"lastName":"@{item().Ops_Representative_Last_Name}",
"firstName":"@{item().Ops_Representative_First_Name}"
}

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT CONCAT(CASE WHEN Error_Count = 0 THEN 'SUCCESSFUL LOAD : ' ELSE 'FAILED LOAD : ' END,Work_Sheet, ' - ', Work_Book) AS Message_Header,
Ops_Representative_Email, Ops_Representative_Last_Name, Ops_Representative_First_Name, Error_Table, Error_Count 
FROM (
SELECT Work_Book, Work_Sheet, Ops_Representative_Email, Ops_Representative_Last_Name, Ops_Representative_First_Name,
CASE WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Certifications' THEN 'audit.OPS_Certification_Error'
     WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Timber Sales' THEN 'audit.OPS_Timber_Sales_Error'
ELSE NULL END AS Error_Table,
CASE WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Certifications' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit.OPS_Certification_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}')
     WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Timber Sales' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit.OPS_Timber_Sales_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}')
ELSE NULL END AS Error_Count
FROM (
SELECT Work_Book, Work_Sheet, wb.Asset_ID, wb.Fund_ID,
ra.Ops_Representative_First_Name, ra.Ops_Representative_Last_Name, ra.Ops_Representative_Email
FROM [audit].[OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List] wb
JOIN [relational].[Asset] ra 
ON wb.Asset_Id = ra.Asset_ID AND wb.Fund_Id = ra.Fund_ID  AND ra.record_deleted_flag = 0 AND wb.Work_Book = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}') x
)z;

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	GeneratedBatchDate as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	WorksheetName as string,
	MasterPipelineName as string,
	Product_Group as string
}
source(output(
		{Source Metric} as string,
		{Period Date} as string,
		Country as string,
		Region as string,
		{Species Common Name} as string,
		{Product Common Name} as string,
		Currency as string,
		UOM as string,
		Market as string,
		{Delivery Point} as string,
		Indicator as string,
		Type as string,
		Basis as string,
		{Origin Port Country} as string,
		{Origin Port Region} as string,
		{Origin Port} as string,
		{Destination Port Country} as string,
		{Destination Port Region} as string,
		{Destination Port} as string,
		{Vessel Name} as string,
		Low as string,
		High as string,
		Average as string,
		Spot as string,
		Comment as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ReadSource
source(output(
		Product_Id as integer,
		Product_Code as string,
		Product_Type as string,
		Product_Global_Grade as string,
		Product_Common_Name as string,
		Product_Desc as string,
		Product_Group as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Species_Common_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Product_Id]\n      ,[Product_Code]\n      ,[Product_Type]\n      ,[Product_Global_Grade]\n      ,[Product_Common_Name]\n      ,[Product_Desc]\n      ,[Product_Group]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Species_Common_Name]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Product]\nWHERE [Product_Id] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimProductLkp
source(output(
		Species_ID as integer,
		Species_Code as string,
		Genus as string,
		Species as string,
		Species_Common_Name as string,
		Species_Group as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Species_ID]\n      ,[Species_Code]\n      ,[Genus]\n      ,[Species]\n      ,[Species_Common_Name]\n      ,[Species_Group]\n  FROM [datamart].[Dim_Species]\nWHERE [Species_ID] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimSpeciesLkp
FilterProcessGroup select(mapColumn(
		Product_Id_Lkp = Product_Id,
		Product_Code_Lkp = Product_Code,
		Product_Type_Lkp = Product_Type,
		Product_Global_Grade_Lkp = Product_Global_Grade,
		Product_Common_Name_Lkp = Product_Common_Name,
		Product_Desc_Lkp = Product_Desc,
		Product_Group_Lkp = Product_Group,
		GL_Code_Lkp = GL_Code,
		Product_Species_Common_Name_Lkp = Species_Common_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimProductLkp
GetUniqueSpicesProductCombination derive(Source_File = concat($WorkbookName,'-', $WorksheetName),
		Batch_ID = replace(replace(replace($GeneratedBatchDate, "-", ""),":","")," ",""),
		Process_Name = $MasterPipelineName,
		Insert_DateTime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> DataTransformation
DatamartDimSpeciesLkp select(mapColumn(
		Species_ID_Lkp = Species_ID,
		Species_Code_Lkp = Species_Code,
		Genus_Lkp = Genus,
		Species_Lkp = Species,
		Species_Common_Name_Lkp = Species_Common_Name,
		Species_Group_Lkp = Species_Group
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimSpeciesLkp
DataTransformation, SelectDimSpeciesLkp lookup({Species Common Name} == Species_Common_Name_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimSpecies
LookupDimSpecies, SelectDimProductLkp lookup({Product Common Name} == Product_Common_Name_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimProduct
DatamartDimProductLkp filter(Product_Group == $Product_Group) ~> FilterProcessGroup
RemoveBlankSpeciesProduct aggregate(groupBy({Species Common Name},
		{Product Common Name}),
	UniqueCount = count()) ~> GetUniqueSpicesProductCombination
LookupDimProduct split(isNull(Species_ID_Lkp),
	isNull(Product_Id_Lkp) || (not(isNull(Species_ID_Lkp)) && not(isNull(Product_Id_Lkp)) && notEquals(Species_Common_Name_Lkp, Product_Species_Common_Name_Lkp)),
	disjoint: true) ~> SplitSpeciesProductDetails@(Species, Product)
SplitSpeciesProductDetails@Species select(mapColumn(
		Species_Common_Name = {Species Common Name},
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Insert_DateTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSpeciesOutput
AddPoductGroup select(mapColumn(
		Product_Common_Name = {Product Common Name},
		Species_Common_Name = {Species Common Name},
		Product_Group,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Insert_DateTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProductOutput
SplitSpeciesProductDetails@Product derive(Product_Group = $Product_Group) ~> AddPoductGroup
ReadSource filter(not(isNull({Species Common Name})) && not(isNull({Product Common Name}))) ~> RemoveBlankSpeciesProduct
SelectSpeciesOutput sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Species_Common_Name,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Insert_DateTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> InsertNewSpeciesDim
SelectProductOutput sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Product_Common_Name,
		Species_Common_Name,
		Product_Group,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Insert_DateTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> InsertNewProductDim

parameters{
	GeneratedBatchDate as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	WorksheetName as string,
	MasterPipelineName as string,
	Product_Group as string,
	TargetFileName as string
}
source(output(
		{Source Metric} as string,
		{Period Date} as string,
		Country as string,
		Region as string,
		{Species Common Name} as string,
		{Product Common Name} as string,
		Currency as string,
		UOM as string,
		Market as string,
		{Delivery Point} as string,
		Indicator as string,
		Type as string,
		Basis as string,
		{Origin Port Country} as string,
		{Origin Port Region} as string,
		{Origin Port} as string,
		{Destination Port Country} as string,
		{Destination Port Region} as string,
		{Destination Port} as string,
		{Vessel Name} as string,
		Low as string,
		High as string,
		Average as string,
		Spot as string,
		Comment as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ReadSource
source(output(
		Product_Id as integer,
		Product_Code as string,
		Product_Type as string,
		Product_Global_Grade as string,
		Product_Common_Name as string,
		Product_Desc as string,
		Product_Group as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Species_Common_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Product_Id]\n      ,[Product_Code]\n      ,[Product_Type]\n      ,[Product_Global_Grade]\n      ,[Product_Common_Name]\n      ,[Product_Desc]\n      ,[Product_Group]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Species_Common_Name]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Product]\nWHERE [Product_Id] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimProductLkp
source(output(
		Species_ID as integer,
		Species_Code as string,
		Genus as string,
		Species as string,
		Species_Common_Name as string,
		Species_Group as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Species_ID]\n      ,[Species_Code]\n      ,[Genus]\n      ,[Species]\n      ,[Species_Common_Name]\n      ,[Species_Group]\n  FROM [datamart].[Dim_Species]\nWHERE [Species_ID] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimSpeciesLkp
source(output(
		Data_Source_Id as integer,
		Metric_Short_Name as string,
		Source_Name as string,
		Source_Type as string,
		Source_Link as string,
		Source_Data_Type as string,
		Data_Process_Type as string,
		Source_Status as string,
		Frequency as string,
		Confidence_Level as string,
		Person_Responsible as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Data_Source_Id]\n      ,[Metric_Short_Name]\n      ,[Source_Name]\n      ,[Source_Type]\n      ,[Source_Link]\n      ,[Source_Data_Type]\n      ,[Data_Process_Type]\n      ,[Source_Status]\n      ,[Frequency]\n      ,[Confidence_Level]\n      ,[Person_Responsible]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Data_Source]\nWHERE [Data_Source_Id] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimDataSource
source(output(
		Type as string,
		Basis as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT\n       [Type]\n      ,[Basis]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Type]\nWHERE [Type_ID] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimTypePartial
source(output(
		Region_ID as integer,
		Country_Code as string,
		Country as string,
		Region_Code as string,
		Region as string,
		Port_Loc as string,
		Long as decimal(20,15),
		Lat as decimal(20,15)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Region_ID]\n      ,[Country_Code]\n      ,[Country]\n      ,[Region_Code]\n      ,[Region]\n      ,[Port_Loc]\n      ,[Long]\n      ,[Lat]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Region]\nWHERE [Region_ID] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimRegion
source(output(
		Date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Date]\nFROM [relational].[DateDimension]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalDateDimension
source(output(
		UOM_ID as integer,
		UOM_Name as string,
		UOM_Desc as string,
		UOM_Type as string,
		UOM_Long_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [UOM_ID]\n      ,[UOM_Name]\n      ,[UOM_Desc]\n      ,[UOM_Type]\n      ,[UOM_Long_Desc]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_UOM]\nWHERE [UOM_ID] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimUom
source(output(
		Delivery_Point_ID as integer,
		Deliver_Point_Code as string,
		Delivery_Point as string,
		Delivery_Point_Desc as string,
		Delivery_Point_Long_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Delivery_Point_ID]\n      ,[Deliver_Point_Code]\n      ,[Delivery_Point]\n      ,[Delivery_Point_Desc]\n      ,[Delivery_Point_Long_Desc]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Delivery_Point]\nWHERE [Delivery_Point_ID] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimDeliveryPoint
source(output(
		Currency_ID as integer,
		Currency_Code as string,
		Currency_Name as string,
		Currency_Numeric_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Currency_ID]\n      ,[Currency_Code]\n      ,[Currency_Name]\n      ,[Currency_Numeric_Code]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Currency]\nWHERE [Currency_ID] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimCurrency
source(output(
		Indicator_Id as integer,
		Indicator_Code as string,
		Indicator_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Indicator_Id]\n      ,[Indicator_Code]\n      ,[Indicator_Desc]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Indicator]\nWHERE [Indicator_Id] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimIndicator
source(output(
		Type_ID as integer,
		Type as string,
		Basis as string,
		Price_Point as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Type_ID]\n      ,[Type]\n      ,[Basis]\n      ,[Price_Point]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Type]\nWHERE [Type_ID] != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimType
FilterProcessGroup select(mapColumn(
		Product_Id_Lkp = Product_Id,
		Product_Code_Lkp = Product_Code,
		Product_Type_Lkp = Product_Type,
		Product_Global_Grade_Lkp = Product_Global_Grade,
		Product_Common_Name_Lkp = Product_Common_Name,
		Product_Desc_Lkp = Product_Desc,
		Product_Group_Lkp = Product_Group,
		GL_Code_Lkp = GL_Code,
		Product_Species_Common_Name_Lkp = Species_Common_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimProductLkp
ReadSource derive(Source_File = concat($WorkbookName,'-', $WorksheetName),
		Batch_ID = replace(replace(replace($GeneratedBatchDate, "-", ""),":","")," ",""),
		Process_Name = $MasterPipelineName,
		{Period Date} = toDate({Period Date}),
		Country_Redefined_For_Lkp = iifNull(Country, "Undefined"),
		Region_Redefined_For_Lkp = iifNull(Region, "Undefined"),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> DataTransformation
RenameDestinationPortAddDP split(not(isNull(DateDimension_Date_Lkp)) && 
not(isNull(Data_Source_Id_Lkp)) && 
( not(isNull(Species_ID_Lkp)) && not(isNull(Product_Id_Lkp)) && equals({Species Common Name}, Product_Species_Common_Name_Lkp) ) && 
( not(isNull(Region_ID_Lkp_CR)) || ( isNull(Region) && not(isNull(Region_ID_Lkp_CO)) ) ) && 
( not(isNull(Type_Lkp)) && not(isNull(Basis_Lkp)) ) && 


( isNull(Currency) || not(isNull(Currency_ID_Lkp)) ) && 
( isNull(UOM) || not(isNull(UOM_ID_Lkp)) ) && 
( isNull({Delivery Point}) || not(isNull(Delivery_Point_ID_Lkp)) ) &&
( isNull(Indicator) || not(isNull(Indicator_Id_Lkp))) &&
( (isNull({Origin Port Country}) && isNull({Origin Port Region}) && isNull({Origin Port})) || not(isNull(Region_ID_Lkp_OP)) ) &&
( (isNull({Destination Port Country}) && isNull({Destination Port Region}) && isNull({Destination Port})) || not(isNull(Region_ID_Lkp_DP)) ),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckInputRecord@(Valid, Invalid)
DatamartDimSpeciesLkp select(mapColumn(
		Species_ID_Lkp = Species_ID,
		Species_Code_Lkp = Species_Code,
		Genus_Lkp = Genus,
		Species_Lkp = Species,
		Species_Common_Name_Lkp = Species_Common_Name,
		Species_Group_Lkp = Species_Group
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimSpeciesLkp
DataTransformation, SelectDimSpeciesLkp lookup({Species Common Name} == Species_Common_Name_Lkp,

DataTransformation3 select(mapColumn(
		Period_Date = DateDimension_Date_Lkp,
		Data_Source_Id = Data_Source_Id_Lkp,
		Region_ID = Region_ID_Lkp,
		Species_ID = Species_ID_Lkp,
		Product_Id = Product_Id_Lkp,
		Type_ID = Type_ID_Lkp,
		UOM_ID = UOM_ID_Lkp,
		Delivery_Point_ID = Delivery_Point_ID_Lkp,
		Currency_ID = Currency_ID_Lkp,
		Indicator_Id = Indicator_Id_Lkp,
		Origin_Port_ID = Region_ID_Lkp_OP,
		Destination_Port_ID = Region_ID_Lkp_DP,
		Market,
		Vessel_Name = {Vessel Name},
		Value,
		Comment,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Batch_ID,
		Source_File,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutput
LookupDimType derive(Value = toDecimal(iifNull(Value, '0'),20,4),
		Data_Source_Id_Lkp = iifNull(Data_Source_Id_Lkp, -1),
		Region_ID_Lkp = iifNull(Region_ID_Lkp, -1),
		Species_ID_Lkp = iifNull(Species_ID_Lkp, -1),
		Product_Id_Lkp = iifNull(Product_Id_Lkp, -1),
		Type_ID_Lkp = iifNull(Type_ID_Lkp, -1),
		UOM_ID_Lkp = iifNull(UOM_ID_Lkp, -1),
		Delivery_Point_ID_Lkp = iifNull(Delivery_Point_ID_Lkp, -1),
		Currency_ID_Lkp = iifNull(Currency_ID_Lkp, -1),
		Indicator_Id_Lkp = iifNull(Indicator_Id_Lkp, -1),
		Region_ID_Lkp_OP = iifNull(Region_ID_Lkp_OP, -1),
		Region_ID_Lkp_DP = iifNull(Region_ID_Lkp_DP, -1)) ~> DataTransformation3
CheckInputRecord@Invalid filter(not(isNull({Period Date})) || 
not(isNull({Source Metric})) || 
not(isNull({Species Common Name})) || 
not(isNull({Product Common Name})) || 
( not(isNull(Country)) && not(isNull(Region)) ) ||
( not(isNull(Country)) && isNull(Region) ) ||  
( not(isNull(Type)) && not(isNull(Basis)) )) ~> FilterInvalidRows
FilterInvalidRows derive(Period_Date_ErrMsg = iif(isNull(DateDimension_Date_Lkp), "Period Date Error/", ""),
		Source_ErrMsg = iif(isNull(Data_Source_Id_Lkp), "Source Error/", ""),
		Region_ErrMsg = iif(isNull(iifNull(Region_ID_Lkp_CR, Region_ID_Lkp_CO)), "Region Error/", ""),
		Type_ErrMsg = iif(isNull(Type_Lkp) || isNull(Basis_Lkp), "Type Error/", ""),
		Species_ErrMsg = iif(isNull(Species_ID_Lkp), "Species Error/", ""),
		Product_ErrMsg = iif(isNull(Product_Id_Lkp), "Product Error/", ""),
		Currency_ErrMsg = iif(not(isNull(Currency)) && isNull(Currency_ID_Lkp), "Currency Error/", ""),
		Uom_ErrMsg = iif(not(isNull(UOM)) && isNull(UOM_ID_Lkp), "UOM Error/", ""),
		DeliveryPoint_ErrMsg = iif(not(isNull({Delivery Point})) && isNull(Delivery_Point_ID_Lkp), "Delivery Point Error/", ""),
		Indicator_ErrMsg = iif(not(isNull(Indicator)) && isNull(Indicator_Id_Lkp), "Indicator Error/", ""),
		OriginPort_ErrMsg = iif(not(isNull({Origin Port Country})) || not(isNull({Destination Port Region})) || not(isNull({Origin Port})) && isNull(Region_ID_Lkp_OP), "Origin Port Error/", ""),
		DestinationPort_ErrMsg = iif(not(isNull({Destination Port Country})) || not(isNull({Destination Port Region})) || not(isNull({Destination Port})) && isNull(Region_ID_Lkp_DP), "Destination Port Error/", ""),
		Species_Product_Combo_ErrMsg = iif(not(isNull(Product_Id_Lkp)) && not(isNull(Species_ID_Lkp)) && notEquals({Species Common Name},Product_Species_Common_Name_Lkp), "Species Product Combination Error/", "")) ~> DerivedErrorMessage
DerivedErrorMessage derive(Combined_ErrMsg = concat(Period_Date_ErrMsg, Source_ErrMsg, Region_ErrMsg, Type_ErrMsg, Species_ErrMsg, Product_ErrMsg, Currency_ErrMsg, Uom_ErrMsg, DeliveryPoint_ErrMsg, Indicator_ErrMsg, OriginPort_ErrMsg, DestinationPort_ErrMsg, Species_Product_Combo_ErrMsg)) ~> CombinedErrMsg
CombinedErrMsg select(mapColumn(
		Metric_Short_Name = {Source Metric},
		Period_Date = {Period Date},
		Country,
		Region,
		Species_Common_Name = {Species Common Name},
		Product_Common_Name = {Product Common Name},
		Currency,
		UOM,
		Market,
		Delivery_Point = {Delivery Point},
		Indicator,
		Type,
		Basis,
		Origin_Port_Country = {Origin Port Country},
		Origin_Port_Region = {Origin Port Region},
		Origin_Port = {Origin Port},
		Destination_Port_Country = {Destination Port Country},
		Destination_Port_Region = {Destination Port Region},
		Destination_Port = {Destination Port},
		Vessel_Name = {Vessel Name},
		Low,
		High,
		Average,
		Spot,
		Comment,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = Combined_ErrMsg
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectErrorOutput
DatamartDimProductLkp filter(Product_Group == $Product_Group) ~> FilterProcessGroup
SelectOutput sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($TargetFileName, '.Fact'))],
	mapColumn(
		Period_Date,
		Data_Source_Id,
		Region_ID,
		Species_ID,
		Product_Id,
		Type_ID,
		UOM_ID,
		Delivery_Point_ID,
		Currency_ID,
		Indicator_Id,
		Origin_Port_ID,
		Destination_Port_ID,
		Market,
		Vessel_Name,
		Value,
		Comment,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Batch_ID,
		Source_File,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetFact
SelectErrorOutput sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['testMarketError.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		Metric_Short_Name,
		Period_Date,
		Country,
		Region,
		Species_Common_Name,
		Product_Common_Name,
		Currency,
		UOM,
		Market,
		Delivery_Point,
		Indicator,
		Type,
		Basis,
		Origin_Port_Country,
		Origin_Port_Region,
		Origin_Port,
		Destination_Port_Country,
		Destination_Port_Region,
		Destination_Port,
		Vessel_Name,
		Low,
		High,
		Average,
		Spot,
		Comment,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkError
